actions.args: {"id": 50, "body": {"name": "Travel Stipends [REDACTED] hackathon - Bangkok, Nov. 24", "summary": "Hi guys,\\\\nI\\\\\\'m super happy to meet you again. Hacking at NEARCon last year in Lisbon was a great experience and I\\\\\\'m very excited to join in Bangkok.\\\\n\\\\nSince last time we met, I\\\\\\'ve been working full time on improving my solutions for a web3 sharing economy with Partage, and am currently building on a car-sharing system to allow users to rent cars owned by other users, in the most secure, decentralized and self-sovereign manner. ", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": null, "description": "I\\\\\\'m coming to the REDACTED hackathon in Bangkok and submit this proposal to try my chance to get part of my travel spendings covered. \\\\n\\\\nI\\\\\\'m [Julien Carbonnell](https://www.linkedin.com/in/juliencarbonnell/), a Blockchain and AI developer and scientist, with a background in smart-city and civic technologies. I\\\\\\'ve been investigating collaborative tech solutions for a while (2011) and fell in love with blockchain\\\\\\'s potential for solving data ownership and sovereignty.  \\\\n\\\\nI usually deliver a new prototype/MVP every 4-6 months and most of it is available on [my github profile](https://github.com/jcarbonnell) or [my huggingface profile](https://huggingface.co/jcarbonnell). Speaking of huggingface, I started earlier this year to train an open source code generation model on 3000 NEAR dApps repositories. It is called [NEARCoder](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b-cLcrGFBqI) and aims to integrate the upcoming NEAR AI platform. I believe NEARCoder got positive attention from the NEAR Builders ecosystem, as it was granted [400 NEAR by potlock](https://app.potlock.org/?tab=project&projectId=devbot.near&nav=funding). \\\\n\\\\nMy main project is called [Partage](https://partage.xyz). I\\\\\\'m a fan of p2p sharing systems, and am curently building a Web3 Car-Sharing solution. Very close to GetAround in terms of functionality, Partage Car-Sharing allows users to rent cars owned by other users, generating a passive income from low-risk investments on one side, and unlocking cars on-demand everywhere in the world on the other side. The reason why it should be on the blockchain is to improve the existing sharing economy services by leveraging the best features of blockchain technology: decentralization, data privacy, self-sovereignty, and a more equitable distribution of economic benefits. \\\\n\\\\nSo I built a working backend last week, plan to ensure a first partnership with a car brand next week, and will wrap it all in a friendly frontend by the submission deadline, October 25th. My goal in Bangkok is to pursue this project IRL, engage more hackers and partners, and keep growing an early adoption crowd around this project.\\\\n\\\\nI will be flying from Barcelona, Spain, where I reside currently, and will try to book the same accomodation in Bangkok as the most participating hackers I\\\\\\'m in touch with. \\\\n\\\\nYour support is very much appreciated.\\\\nSee you there!\\\\nJulien", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "partage.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": ["Travel expenses"]}

{"body": {"name": "Travel Stipend [REDACTED] Movement - Bangkok, Nov. 2024", "summary": "Hey Everyone! I recently graduated from college and am looking to create something valuable that can generate revenue and give back to the community. I\\\\\\'ve been familiar with the Near ecosystem for more than a year, I also had a chance to attend Nearcon in Lisbon but my visa got rejected. I have a passion for web3 and would love to build things in the ecosystem and ship them.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": null, "description": "## Purpose of stipend\\\\nI wanted to apply for the travel stipend to support my expenses for the Near Redacted Hackathon and attend it IRL. I\\\\\\'d love to interact with the team and learn more about Near\\\\\\'s goal through in-person events.\\\\n\\\\n## My Records\\\\nSo I\\\\\\'ve been an active hacker in the hackathons space as well and I\\\\\\'ve worked as a Full Stack Developer previously.\\\\n\\\\n1. https://devpost.com/software/medibridge-7ky93d Here\\\\\\'s the project that I built for the Near Horizon X MLH Hackathon and won the first prize.\\\\n2. I\\\\\\'ve been part of the MLH Fellowship where we further developed the product but due to legal issues and no validation from the surroundings we had to drop the project.\\\\n3. I participated in ETHSingapore and built DeReal https://ethglobal.com/showcase/dereal-b9tsg, I scored the chainlink bounty for this.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n## Travel Itinerary:\\\\nFlights back and forth from Lucknow, India to Bangkok \\\\n8th flying from Lucknow to Bangkok \\\\n9th Arrive Bangkok early morning\\\\n17th Night traveling back to Lucknow(due to time zone difference will reach the same day)\\\\nFlights: 500 USD\\\\nStay: 200 USD\\\\nOther cost(Food + transport): 150\\\\n\\\\n## Project Plan\\\\nI want to extend DeReal\\\\\\'s functionality and build a proper Social Media application on Near. \\\\nAn extension to this would be introducing more Privacy, and incentivizing the User through rewards for their data(Likes, hashtags). \\\\n\\\\nI\\\\\\'ve also gone through other apps - if surpported right, this could blow up.\\\\n\\\\nThank you for considering my application, I hope this gets the approval and I can attend Redacted and be part of User-Owned Future.\\\\n\\\\nHoping to meet the team,\\\\nPrakhar Ojha.", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "prakharojha.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "850", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Travel expenses"], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 129772056}
